attributes.additional_details:
I propose the reintroduction of Section 28, to prevent the promotion and equation of homosexuality in public places & Schools.

Thou shall not 'intentionally promote homosexuality or publish material with the intention of promoting homosexual lifestyle which will encourage others to believe that homosexuality is normal.

Strengthens the impression of the nuclear family on children which is the foundation of British society.

Its encouraging homosexuality and by making it subject to be learnt about within the school enviroment which it should not be.

The promotion of homosexuality in public, in forms of pride marches and other events, that affect those that do not wish to have their views of homosexuals forced onto them.
